<S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> the <S%H5550>siege<s%> <S%H5550>mounds<s%> have <S%H935>reached<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> it; and the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> Thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%> has <S%H1961>come<s%> to <S%H1961>pass;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> Thou <S%H7200>seest<s%> [it.]
